title: Great location and beautiful home you get 4 beds and 3 baths.
description:
Recently renovated, 3-Story home sitting on a 80 foot deep lot, zoned RM1 in booming Old Kensington! The deep navy facade and stone bottom give curb appeal to this 4 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom home with original character and charm. Walk through the front door and into the vestibule where you will find hooks to hang your garments and an original refinished glass door. The living room and dining room feature refinished original in-lay oak hardwood flooring. Recessed lighting is throughout the first floor. The dining room provides plenty of space for the table of your choice as well as a built-in bookshelf/cocktail bar! The kitchen features Gary shaker cabinets, stainless steel appliances, penny round tile backsplash and butcher block kitchen countertops. Off the back of the kitchen is a mud-room, perfect for storage and a side door out to your humongous yard, for city standards, waiting for you to turn it into the perfect urban oasis. Up the original refinished staircase and on the 2nd Floor you will find, 2 bedrooms, both with closet space, a recently renovated, modern bathroom and a laundry room that you may actually enjoy washing clothes in! On the 3rd Floor you will find the Primary Suite, decked out with a huge bedroom in the front, another bedroom in the middle that is now being used as an office (but can also make a perfect nursery) a subway tiled bathroom with a frameless glass door shower and flex space in the back for extra storage that also has a wet bar for convenience. This home was recently renovated within the last few years and has all new plumbing, electric and dual zone HVAC. 1833 N 2nd Street is within walking distance to some of the best amenities that Old Kensington has to offer, including; Hook & Master, Human Robot Brewing, Stateside Vodka, Luna Cafe, LMNO & just blocks away from Frankford Avenue & steps from the EL for public transportation. RM1 Zoning will also allow a conversion to 3 residential units by-right*. Buy now to live in with future investment potential in mind!

title: Absolutely charming modern 3 bed 1.5 bath Strawberry Mansion home!
description:
3221 Fontain St. 3 bed 1.5 bath house – AVAILABLE JULY 2022!
Located in Strawberry Mansion, slightly north of the up and coming Brewerytown section of Philadelphia you’ll enjoy the easy accessibility that the city has to offer without being in the center of it all. Located just off of N 33rd St next to Fairmount Park-you can easily hop onto Kelly Drive do get into town or to get to work out of the city. With the Dell Center a short walk away you can easily catch live shows! Or head down to Girard Ave. and grab a coffee at The Monkey & The Elephant, or grab a bite a Spot Burger or Pizza Dads!
Renovated to modern standards, this 3 bedroom 1.5 bath house has everything you need to live comfortably and tons more! Enter into a large open floor plan for living and/or dining with a half bathroom off the kitchen, this home showcases hardwood flooring throughout the entire house with exposed brick for a classic & refined appearance. The kitchen comes with tons of cabinet space, a full size stove, microwave, dishwasher and more!
The second floor features three roomy bedrooms with great closet space and full size bathroom with tub, toilet and vanity. This house really maximizes every square inch!
Don’t forget, you get your own washer and dryer too!!

title: Enjoy magnificent views of the delaware river
description:
Stunning, fully renovated corner one bedroom unit at society hill towers! Enjoy magnificent views of the delaware river, ben franklin bridge, and society hill from floor to ceiling windows! Beautiful oak hardwood floors run throughout the unit. The kitchen boasts frigidaire stainless steel appliances, natural stone and porcelain backsplash, granite counters, and wood cabinets. The bathroom features a large sink and vanity, glass mosaic tiled shower walls, and white natural stone floors. The unit has newer hvac. The rent includes all utilities, 24/7 concierge plus security guard, and verizon fios tv. Verizon internet is available for $30.99 monthly. Laundry room with newer machines are in the finished basement accessible by the elevators. No dogs allowed in building. The towers is uniquely located on five acres of suburban-like grounds yet is close to the delaware river, parks, and restaurants and shops of olde city, center city, rittenhouse, northern liberties and fishtown. The shopping plaza features zahav restaurant (previously named best u.S. Restaurant), sue's produce food market and a cleaners. There is an underground garage accessible by the elevators, with locked bicycle storage rooms. Enjoy the large, secluded outdoor in-ground swimming pool, its grounds, grills and locker rooms. The towers has an upgraded fitness center, hospitality suites for guests, community room, and storage lockers pending availability. The aforementioned are available for reasonable additional fees. Nearby is street parking, major highways and public transit. Your new home awaits! As per owner’s wishes, by july 31 all applications will be reviewed.

title: Jogging trail right outside your door, Pet-friendly living, Bark park
description:
YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. description:

title: 3BR/2.5BA Chesterbrook Townhome
description:
This wonderfully upgraded home is 100 yards from Wilson Park in the sought after Cheswold Village neighborhood of Chesterbook. It features hardwood flooring, new windows, neutral paint and an open floor plan. There is a reserved parking space in front of the unit plus additional unreserved spaces.
The first floor offers a renovated kitchen with Corian countertops, handsome cabinetry plus a separate dining area, a dining/living room with fireplace, an updated powder room and sliding glass doors to the private patio.
The second floor hosts the master suite with a gorgeously renovated private bath and a doorway to the deck, a second bedroom, a beautifully renovated hall bathroom & a laundry closet with washer/dryer.
The third floor is a true, private 3rd bedroom/home office with direct access from the 2nd floor hallway.
The full basement offers tremendous storage.
This home is located in the award winning Tredyffrin-Easttown school district off the Rte. 202 Chesterbook Blvd. exit with quick access to King of Prussia, I-76, I-476, 422 and I-276.
It is close to trains, parks, shops and corporate centers.
Terms:
No Pets
No Smoking
First and last month's rent plus security deposit due at lease signing = $6,600
Minimum verifiable household gross income = $79,200
Minimum credit score = 700
Minimum rental period = 1 year
Renter responsible for renter’s insurance, electric, cable and phone/internet.
Landlord pays HOA fee, Trash/Sewer

So cute! Newly renovated Cape Cod home sits on an acre of prime wooded real estate in beautiful Bucks County. Close to shopping, recreation, and major transportation arteries in the desirable Council Rock school district. Take in your own private paradise as you bask in the serenity of your surroundings from the secluded backyard deck overlooking an idyllic natural setting which includes a lovely creek meandering throughout the property. Landscaping is included so just relax and enjoy the peaceful sights and sounds of nature that surrounds you!
Home features a recently remodeled kitchen with plenty of cabinet space, deep stainless steel sink, granite countertops and modern appliances. There are two bedrooms and two fully updated baths with an additional upstairs room for extra space. Basement is finished with cedar wainscoting, updated Armstrong acoustic drop ceiling with recessed LED lights throughout, and Pergo flooring. Intimate and cozy living room and dining room await your arrival. Entire home has been freshly painted and new Empire carpets installed throughout the upstairs, the living room, and dining room. New Anderson windows and doors throughout. Washer and dryer included. New water heater and updated heating system for the utmost in energy efficiency. Private driveway with ample parking leads up to a detached garage. A/C units provided.

title: offering beautiful city views
description:
Welcome to this gorgeous, ultra modern, sun dappled, 2 bed, 2 full bath corner unit, offering beautiful city views at penn treaty residences at 1405 frankford avenue. This amazing condominium is located at the very heart of prime fishtown, philadelphia's most dynamic, vibrant and sought-after neighborhood! Situated directly behind fishtown's historic, and newly remodeled, rose garden, enter this barely 3 year old, secure, 30 unit building and enjoy your urban oasis to the fullest. Entering #409 you will find rich mocha colored flooring throughout, a convenient coat closet, then your first, oversized, full bathroom. Each spacious bedroom offers great light and the primary boasts and en suite full bathroom as well. Your ultra-modern designed bathrooms both feautre italian tile flooring and beautiful tiling andporcelain vanities. Down the hallway find an ideally located laundry closet on the way to your open concept kitchen/living room offering wonderful views. Note the double thick quartz countertops , high end ge stainless steel appliances including a double wall oven, cooktop stove and french door refrigerator, complete with an electric fireplace. Need parking? No worries add a deeded garage parking space for an additional $250 a month!This beautifully maintained building's amenities include a spacious common roof deck with spectacular 360 views including center city and the ben franklin bridge, storage bins for each unit, bike room in the basement, secure key fob entry and of course an elevator. Mere steps from la columbe, suraya, wm mulherin's & sons, kensington quarters, ramona susan's bake shop, heffe tacos, city fitness gym and a myriad of other bars, restaurants, bakeries, souperies, specialty shops, nail salons, boutique clothiers and so much more. This is why forbes magazine called fishtown america's hottest "new" neighborhood in 2018 and it's only gotten better since. A 5 minute walk to the el or multiple bus lines, easy access to i-76 & i-95, walk & bike scores of 94 ("paradise") so what are you waiting for? Make it yours today!
1405-21 frankford ave #409

title: Welcome to lawrence st!
description:
Welcome to lawrence st! Be the first to live in this brand new, luxury bi-level apartment on a quiet block in northern liberties! This spacious 2 bed, 1.5 bath offers plenty of living space and has a perfect garden space for outdoor entertaining. Enter the unit from your private access alley into the main living space which features a large kitchen with eat-in bar, convenient half bath, 10+ foot ceilings, and large floor-to-ceiling windows that let in tons of natural light. The kitchen has tons of storage, high-end quartz countertops and modern subway tile backsplash with plenty of counter space for all your cooking and entertaining. The living room is a great size and looks out into the private garden space, offering an indoor-outdoor flow also excellent for entertaining. The garden is not pictured due to the ongoing work, but is large enough to fit your bbq and seating easily, plus room for all your flowers and plants! Head downstairs to find two generously sized bedrooms with large closets, a large full bath with great storage, and a full sized washer/dryer. A polished concrete floor, stylish/classic tile choices, and custom pella windows complete the modern vibe. No details were overlooked in this building! It has in-unit washer/dryer, full kitchen appliance package including dishwasher and garbage disposal, hvac, solid hardwood floors, high ceilings over 10ft, gigantic windows to let in tons of natural light, as well as thoughtful layouts to minimize sound between units. Building is outfitted with fire alarm system, sprinklers, intercom and camera system to ensure safety and security. Conveniently located near i-95. Walking distance to great bars and restaurants including: yards brewing, cafe la maude, north third, and even target!
